on_actions = {
	on_startup = {

		effect = {
			# Add Canals
			IF = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" 
				}
				58 = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = canal_kiel
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
						province =  6389
					}
				}
				685 = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = canal_panama
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
						province =  7617
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#Setup Colonial Powers
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						any_owned_state = {
							NOT = { is_core_of = PREV }
						}
					}
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						any_owned_state = {
							NOT = { is_core_of = PREV }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.colonial_powers = THIS }
				}
			}
		}

		#Setup Asian + Oceania Nations
		effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						any_core_state = {
							OR = {
								is_on_continent = australia
								is_on_continent = asia
							}		
						}
						capital_scope = {
							OR = {
								is_on_continent = australia
								is_on_continent = asia
							}
						}
						OR =  {
							exists = yes
							exists = no
						}
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						any_core_state = {
							OR = {
								is_on_continent = australia
								is_on_continent = asia
							}		
						}
						capital_scope = {
							OR = {
								is_on_continent = australia
								is_on_continent = asia
							}
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.asian_and_oceanian_countries = THIS }
				}
			}
		}

		#Setup Asian (Pacific) Nations
		effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						any_core_state = {
							is_on_continent = asia
						}
						capital_scope = {
							is_on_continent = asia
						}
						OR =  {
							exists = yes
							exists = no
						}
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						any_core_state = {
							is_on_continent = asia
						}
						capital_scope = {
							is_on_continent = asia
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.asian_countries = THIS }
				}
			}
		}

		#Setup South American Nations
		effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						any_core_state = {
							is_on_continent = south_america
						}
						capital_scope = {
							is_on_continent = south_america
						}
						OR =  {
							exists = yes
							exists = no
						}
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						any_core_state = {
							is_on_continent = south_america
						}
						capital_scope = {
							is_on_continent = south_america
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.south_american_countries = THIS }
				}
			}
		}

		#Setup Middle Eastern Nations
		effect = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						any_core_state = {
							is_on_continent = middle_east
						}
						capital_scope = {
							is_on_continent = middle_east
						}
						OR =  {
							exists = yes
							exists = no
						}
					}
				}
				every_possible_country = {
					limit = {
						any_core_state = {
							is_on_continent = middle_east
						}
						capital_scope = {
							is_on_continent = middle_east
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.middle_eastern_countries = THIS }
				}
			}
		}

	}
	# country
	on_new_term_election = {
		random_events = {
			100 = usa.6
			100 = usa.7
			100 = usa.8
			100 = usa.9
			100 = usa.10
			100 = usa.11
			100 = usa.12
		}
		random_events = {
			100 = spain.9
			100 = lar_spain.1
		}
		random_events = {
			100 = election.2
			100 = election.3
			100 = election.4
			100 = election.5
			100 = election.6
			100 = election.11
			100 = election.12
			100 = election.13
			100 = election.14
			100 = election.15
		}
	}

	on_daily_SWE = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					#is_ironman =  = yes
					original_tag = SWE
					has_completed_focus = SWE_per_albin_bus
					divisions_in_state = {
						state = 141
						size > 0 # use < or ><state_id>
						unit = bus # optional. specific unit eg. mountaineers, light_tank
					}
				}
				set_variable = { global.achievement_days_since_bus_left_stockholm = 0 }
		
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					divisions_in_state = {
						state = 141
						size < 1 # use < or ><state_id>
						unit = bus # optional. specific unit eg. mountaineers, light_tank
					}
					check_variable = { global.achievement_days_since_bus_left_stockholm < 100 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { global.achievement_days_since_bus_left_stockholm = 1 }
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = SWE
					has_completed_focus = SWE_per_albin_bus
					divisions_in_state = {
						state = 681
						size > 0 # use < or ><state_id>
						unit = bus # optional. specific unit eg. mountaineers, light_tank
					}

					check_variable = { global.achievement_days_since_bus_left_stockholm < 19 }
				}

				set_global_flag = achievement_has_managed_to_travel_to_cape_town_in_18_days
			}
		}
	}

	# Ace pilots
	# country, FROM = ace
	on_ace_promoted = {
		random_events = {
			100 = ace_promoted.1
			5 = ace_promoted.2
		}
	}

	# country, FROM = ace, PREV = enemy ace
	# This event fires twice, once for each ace.
	on_aces_killed_each_other = {
		random_events = {
			100 = aces_killed_each_other.1
		}
	}

	# country, FROM = our ace,
	# PREV = enemy ace, has killed FROM
	on_ace_killed_by_ace = {
		random_events = {
			100 = ace_killed_by_ace.1
		}
	}

	# country, FROM = our ace,
	# PREV = enemy ace, killed by FROM
	on_ace_killed_other_ace = {
		random_events = {
			100 = ace_killed_other_ace.1
		}
	}

	# our ace is killed by no name
	# country, FROM = ace
	on_ace_killed = {
		random_events = {
			100 = ace_died.1
		}
	}

	# our ace died in accident
	# country, FROM = ace
	on_ace_killed_on_accident = {

	}

	# enemy ace is killed by our non name
	# country, FROM = enemy ace
	on_non_ace_killed_other_ace = {

	}

	# During justifying wargoals
	# triggered daily, so make sure there is a sink somewhere not firing events
	# country, FROM = target nation
	on_justifying_wargoal_pulse = {

		random_events = {
			100 = war_justification.1
			100 = war_justification.2
			100 = war_justification.3
			100 = war_justification.4
			100 = war_justification.5
			100 = war_justification.6
			100 = war_justification.7
			100 = war_justification.8
			100 = war_justification.9
			100 = war_justification.10
			100 = war_justification.11
			100 = war_justification.12
			100 = war_justification.13
			100 = war_justification.14
			100 = war_justification.15
			100 = war_justification.16
			100 = war_justification.17
			100 = war_justification.18
			100 = war_justification.19
			17000 = 0
		}
	}

	on_wargoal_expire = {
		random_events = {
			100 = war_justification.301
		}
	}

	on_nuke_drop = {

		effect = {
			set_global_flag = first_nuke_dropped
			set_variable = {
				global.nukecountry = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = first_nuke_dropped } }
				country_event = { id = generic.8 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = race_for_the_bomb_outclassed }
				remove_ideas = race_for_the_bomb_outclassed
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = achievement_has_dropped_nuke }
					num_nukes_being_dropped < 100
				}
				goto_state = FROM
				set_country_flag = achievement_has_dropped_nuke
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { state = 378 }
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_has_nuked_california
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { is_core_of = AST }
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_AST_nuke_self
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = SWE
					FROM = {
						is_owned_by = DEN
						is_core_of = DEN
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_med_plutonium
			}

			if = { #Med Plutonium 2 
				limit = {
					tag = DEN
					FROM = {
						is_owned_by = SWE
						is_core_of = SWE
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_med_plutonium_2
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_core_of = JAP
					}
					has_global_flag = JAP_nuke_1
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = JAP_nuke_2
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = JAP_nuke_2
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_core_of = JAP
					}
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = JAP_nuke_1
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = JAP_nuke_1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 953
					}
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = land_of_fire_flag
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = land_of_fire_flag
			}

			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.2 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.3 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.4 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.5 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.6 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.7 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.8 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.9 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.10 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.11 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.12 days = 1 }
			news_event = { id = nuke_dropped.13 days = 1 }
		}
		random_events = {
			100 = nuke_dropped.0
		}
	}

	# country random events
	#on_bi_yearly_pulse = {
	#
	#}

	#on_five_year_pulse = {
	#
	#}

	on_border_war_lost = {
		effect = {
			owner = {
				country_event = { id = china.14 }
				country_event = { id = china.16 }
			}
		}
	}

	# FROM is the faction Leader, ROOT is the country leaving the faction
	on_leave_faction = {
		effect = {

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = TO_joined_brussels_treaty
				}
				clr_country_flag = TO_joined_brussels_treaty
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						tag = CAN
						NOT = { has_dlc = "Together for Victory" }
					}
				}
				abandon_colony_tag = yes
			}

			IF = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						ROOT = { #We should remove this
							has_country_flag = leave_faction_happily_flag
						}
						FROM = { is_subject_of = ROOT } # This shouldn't really be possible outside of specific content so best to block
						ROOT = { is_subject_of = FROM } # If the effect is desired, add something custom
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					add_opinion_modifier = {
						modifier = faction_traitor
						target = ROOT
						days = 365
					}

					add_opinion_modifier = {
						modifier = faction_traitor_trade
						target = ROOT
						days = 365
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#FROM is the one that joins the faction
	on_create_faction = {
		effect = {
			# Sunset invasion check
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { is_puppet = no }
					OR = {
						AND = {
							tag = MEX
							FROM = {
								capital_scope = {
									NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							FROM = {
								tag = MEX
							}
							capital_scope = {
								NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_failed_sunset_invasion
			}
		}
	}

	#FROM is country getting invited.
	on_offer_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			#Give achievement to nation joining a faction, but not in one from game start
			if = {
				limit = {
					date > 1936.01.02
				}
				FROM = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_faction_leader = no
						}
						set_country_flag = achievement_has_joined_faction
					}
				}
			}
			#Remove anti_soviet_pact if joining commie Soviet in faction
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = SOV
					has_government = communism
					FROM = {
						has_idea = anti_soviet_pact
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					remove_ideas = anti_soviet_pact
				}
			}

			# Sunset invasion check
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_puppet = no
					OR = {
						AND = {
							tag = MEX
							FROM = {
								capital_scope = {
									NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							FROM = {
								tag = MEX
							}
							capital_scope = {
								NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_failed_sunset_invasion
			}
		}
	}

	#FROM is faction leader on join faction requests. THIS DOES NOT FIRE ON ADD_TO_FACTION EFFECT! USE ON_OFFER_JOIN_FACTION!
	on_join_faction = {
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = achievement_has_joined_faction
			#Remove anti_soviet_pact if joining commie Soviet in faction
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = anti_soviet_pact
					FROM = {
						original_tag = SOV
						has_government = communism
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = anti_soviet_pact
			}

			# Sunset invasion check
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_puppet = no
					OR = {
						AND = {
							tag = MEX
							FROM = {
								capital_scope = {
									NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
								}
							}
						}
						AND = {
							FROM = {
								tag = MEX
							}
							capital_scope = {
								NOT = { is_on_continent = south_america }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = achievement_failed_sunset_invasion
			}

			# Romania shouldn't declare war on Bulgaria on historical mode, if both are going to join the Axis
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = BUL
					FROM = { original_tag = GER }
					is_historical_focus_on = yes
				}
				ROM = {
					add_ai_strategy = {
						type = befriend
						id = "BUL"
						value = 200
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#FROM is war target
	on_declare_war = {
		effect = {
			#make sure Germany doesn't force ideology on France for the achievement
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { original_tag = FRA }
					tag = GER
				}
				set_country_flag = invalid_for_danzig_achievement
			}
			#make sure warlords don't use the same guy
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_chinese_warlord = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							original_tag = FROM
							NOT = { has_country_flag = warlord_replaced }
						}
					}
					ROOT = {
						retire_country_leader = yes
						set_country_flag = warlord_replaced
					}
					FROM = {
						warlord_rule_all_parties = yes
					}
				}
			}
			#make sure Dominions lose the dominion tag
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = CAN
						original_tag = RAJ
						original_tag = MAL
						original_tag = INS
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						ROOT = {
							original_tag = FROM
						}
					}
					abandon_colony_tag = yes
					FROM = {
						abandon_colony_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						OR = {
							has_idea = american_protection_drift_democratic
							has_idea = american_protection_drift_communism
							has_idea = american_protection_drift_fascism
							has_idea = american_protection_defence_democratic
							has_idea = american_protection_defence_communism
							has_idea = american_protection_defence_fascism
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = USA
						is_in_faction_with = USA # I guess USA will not go to war with someone they are in faction with
						has_war_with = USA
						#USA = { has_war_with = FROM } Should USA enforce peace in a nation it is already at war with?
					}
					OR = {
						has_idea = american_protection_drift_democratic
						has_idea = american_protection_drift_communism
						has_idea = american_protection_drift_fascism
						has_idea = american_protection_defence_democratic
						has_idea = american_protection_defence_communism
						has_idea = american_protection_defence_fascism
					}
				}
				FROM = { country_event = { id = usa.16 days = 1 } }
			}

			# Remove pact opinion modifiers if at war with Germany
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = GER
					FROM = {
						OR = {
							has_opinion_modifier = anti_comintern_pact_opinion
							has_opinion_modifier = tripartite_pact_opinion
							has_idea = anti_soviet_pact
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = { target = GER modifier = anti_comintern_pact_opinion }
					remove_opinion_modifier = { target = GER modifier = tripartite_pact_opinion }
					remove_ideas = anti_soviet_pact
				}
			}
			#Germany has started a war - allies should try to contain Germany
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						tag = GER
					}
					FROM = {
						NOT = {
							original_tag = SIL
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = GER_has_started_war
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = GER_has_started_war
			}



			#Call Anti-Soviet pact members to war
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = SOV
						has_government = communism
					}
					FROM = { has_idea = anti_soviet_pact }
				}
				save_event_target_as = anti_soviet_pact_aggressor
				FROM = {
					country_event = { id = germany.84 days = 1 }
				}
			}

			#Remove previous ideology civil war faction from Democratic Germany faction and add Democratic civil war faction to Germany's faction
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					#	has_civil_war = yes
						NOT = { has_government = democratic }
					}
					has_government = democratic
					GER = { has_government = democratic }
				}
				FROM = { set_country_flag = GER_civil_war_target }
				GER = { remove_from_faction = FROM }
				GER = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
				GER = { country_event = wtt_germany.52 }
			}

			#If prepared by siphoning equipment, receive equipment back
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_civil_war = yes
						has_country_flag = siphoned_equipment_stockpiles_for_civil_war
					}
					has_civil_war = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					clr_country_flag = siphoned_equipment_stockpiles_for_civil_war
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = infantry_equipment
						amount = 1000
					}
				}
			}

			#If prepared with surprise attack plan, get bonus
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						original_tag = ROOT
						#has_civil_war = yes
						has_country_flag = formulated_surprise_attack_plan_for_civil_war
					}
					#has_civil_war = yes
				}
				FROM = {
					clr_country_flag = formulated_surprise_attack_plan_for_civil_war
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = civil_war_surprise_attack_plan
						days = 30
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_civil_war = yes
						original_tag = SPR
					}
					has_civil_war = yes
					original_tag = SPR

				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = FRA
						OR = {
							has_completed_focus = FRA_right_wing_rhetoric
							has_completed_focus = FRA_utilize_the_leagues
						}
					}
					country_event = { id = france.32 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	# When a new faction is formed
	on_faction_formed = {
		effect = {
			news_event = { id = news.159 }
		}
	}

	# ROOT is capitulated country, FROM is winner
	on_capitulation = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = SOV
					FIN = {
						has_war_with = SOV
						is_in_faction = no
						is_ai = no
						controls_state = 219
						any_war_score > 14
					}
					NOT = { has_global_flag = finnish_him_achievement_flag }
				}
				set_global_flag = finnish_him_achievement_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = GER
					FROM = {
						tag = SOV
					}
					NOT = { has_global_flag = fall_of_berlin_sov }
				}
				play_victory_parade_effect = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = GER
				}
				8 = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
						remove_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				28 = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
						remove_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				807 = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
						remove_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				85 = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
						remove_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_government = fascism }
					69 = {
						if = {
							limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
							remove_core_of = ROOT
						}
					}
					74 = {
						if = {
							limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
							remove_core_of = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { original_tag = GER }
					NOT = { has_government = fascism }
					has_civil_war = no
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							FROM = {
								original_tag = SPR
							}
							original_tag = SPR
						}
					}
				}
				news_event = { id = country_capitulated.0 days = 0 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { tag = FRA }
				set_global_flag = FRA_already_surrendered
				set_variable = { global.FRA_capitulation_days = global.num_days }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = JAP }
					ROOT = { tag = CHI }
				}
				JAP = { JAP_intervene_in_china_remove = yes }
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = POL
					has_government = neutrality
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = POL_fulfil_fifth_of_november }
				}
				retire_country_leader = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = YUG
				}
				remove_ideas = YUG_idea_economic_aid
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"} # AAT uses separate system
					original_tag = DEN
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = ROOT
							is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						}
						100 = { is_controlled_by = PREV }
					}

				}
				country_event = { id = wtt_denmark.1 days = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = FRA
					has_government = democratic
					NOT = { has_global_flag = achievement_france_surrender } #might as well use the achievement flag to check if france.10 fired
					16 = { is_controlled_by = GER } # Don't fire if someone else is the occupier of Paris
					16 = { is_owned_by = FRA }
					is_subject = no
					is_in_faction_with = ENG
					has_war_with = GER
				}
				# Revoke all guarantees
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
					}
					ROOT = {
						diplomatic_relation = {
							country = PREV
							relation = guarantee
							active = no
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = france.10
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = GER
					has_government = fascism
				}
				set_global_flag = germany_lost_the_war
			}

			if = {
				limit= {
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = ENG
					}
					FROM = {
						original_tag = ICE
					}
				}

				set_global_flag = achivement_ice_capitulated_eng
			}

			if = { #NHMMAP TODO: Move into regular NHMMAP FILE
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = CZE
						has_government = communism
						is_in_faction_with = SOV
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = POL }
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = HUN }
					}
					FROM = {
						original_tag = GER
					}
				}	
				SOV = { country_event = czech.60 }
			}
		}

		#GERMANY - Set Flag in capitulated countries and add them to array for Seize Gold Reserves Decision purposes
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = GER
							is_ally_with = GER
						}
					}
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe }
							original_tag = TUR
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_country_flag = GER_has_capitulated_to_germany
					add_to_array = { 
						array = GER.GER_seize_gold_targets_array 
						value = THIS
					}
				}
			}
		}

		effect = { #if Austria resists Anschluss, give Germany cores on Austria once they capitulate
			IF = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = AUS
					FROM = {
						original_tag = GER
						has_country_flag = GER_anscluss_rejected
					}
				}

				add_state_core = 4
				add_state_core = 152
				add_state_core = 153
				add_state_core = 848
				add_state_core = 975
				add_state_core = 976
			}
		}
	}

	# ROOT is previously capitulated country
	on_uncapitulation = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = FRA
					has_government = democratic
					is_puppet = no
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}
	#ROOT is capitulated country, FROM is winner.
	on_capitulation_immediate = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = BEL
						is_in_faction = yes
						#is_government_in_exile = yes
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						295 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}
					295 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						538 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}

					538 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						888 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}

					888 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						889 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}
					889 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }

				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						890 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}

					890 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }

				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						769 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}

					769  = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						768 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}
					768 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						718 = {
							is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
						}
					}
					718 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
				}
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = FRA
						is_in_faction = yes
					}

					635 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
				}

				635 = { set_state_flag = prevent_auto_flip_after_capitulation }
			}
		}
	}

	on_government_change = {
		effect = {
			#Make sure Soviet can always create factions
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = SOV
					NOT = { has_government = communism }
				}
				set_rule = { can_create_factions = yes }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = democratic }
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = democratic_opposition_voicing_protests }
					remove_ideas = democratic_opposition_voicing_protests
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = democratic_revolutionaries }
					remove_ideas = democratic_revolutionaries
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = reign_of_terror }
					remove_ideas = reign_of_terror
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = communism }
				if = {
					limit = { TAG = SAF }
					set_cosmetic_tag = SAF_COM
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = communist_partisans_recruiting }
					remove_ideas = communist_partisans_recruiting
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = communist_revolutionaries }
					remove_ideas = communist_revolutionaries
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = communism_defeated }
					remove_ideas = communism_defeated
				}

				#Remove anti_soviet_pact
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = anti_soviet_pact }
					remove_ideas = anti_soviet_pact
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = fascism }
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = fascist_assault_divisions }
					remove_ideas = fascist_assault_divisions
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = fascist_revolutionaries }
					remove_ideas = fascist_revolutionaries
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = fascism_defeated }
					remove_ideas = fascism_defeated
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = anti_nazi_coup }
					remove_ideas = anti_nazi_coup
				}
			}
			#Replace the following two with events for SOV if they are not communist.
			#if = {
			#	limit = {
			#		OR = {
			#			has_idea = trotskyite_plot
			#			has_idea = trotskyite_plot_purged
			#		}
			#		NOT = {
			#			has_civil_war = yes
			#		}
			#	}
			#	country_event = { id = soviet.54 }
			#}
		}
	}

	on_coup_succeeded = {
		effect = {
			#Turn elections on for democracies created from coup
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					has_government = democratic
					original_tag = ROOT
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = democratic
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#ROOT is winner #FROM gets annexed - This will also fire on_annex
	on_civil_war_end = {
		effect = {

			#End of SCW
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_dlc = "La Resistance" }
					FROM = {
						original_tag = SPR
					}
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = SPR
						has_government = fascism
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_historical_focus_on = no
							has_completed_focus = SPA_supremacy_of_the_communion
						}
					}
					add_timed_idea = { idea = SPA_recovering_from_civil_war days = 2190 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						NOT = {
							has_completed_focus = SPA_supremacy_of_the_communion
						}
					}
					add_ideas = SPA_recovering_from_civil_war #keep the spirit on historical mode, keeping them out of the war
				}
			}
			#End of SCW
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						original_tag = SPR
					}
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = SPR
						OR = {
							has_government = democratic
							has_government = communism
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = {
					set_country_flag = achievement_won_spanish_civil_war
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = democratic
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			#End of German Civil War
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						original_tag = GER
						has_government = fascism
					}
					original_tag = GER
					has_government = neutrality
					NOT = { is_subject_of = HOL }
				}
				set_global_flag = { flag = civil_war_olympics value = 1 days = 30 }
				country_event = { id = wtt_germany.18 days = 1 }
			}
			#End of US civil war
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = USA
					OR = {
						has_government = neutrality
						has_government = fascism
					}
				}
				news_event = { id = mtg_news.7 days = 4 random_days = 5 }
			}
			#End of Balkan war
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "Death or Dishonor"
					original_tag = YUG
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = yugoslav_puppet_flag
					}
					white_peace = PREV
					PREV = { puppet = PREV }
					set_autonomy = { target = THIS autonomy_state = autonomy_integrated_puppet }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = { has_focus_tree = yugoslavian_focus }
					}
					load_focus_tree = { tree = yugoslavian_focus keep_completed = yes }
					unlock_national_focus = YUG_end_the_regency
				}
			}
			#End of ideology Civil War
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ideology_civil_war
				}
				clr_country_flag = ideology_civil_war
				set_country_flag = { flag = won_ideology_civil_war value = 1 days = 365 }
				country_event = { id = generic.11 days = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = BUL
					has_focus_tree = generic_focus
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = BUL_second_national_catastrophe }
					remove_ideas = BUL_second_national_catastrophe
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = BUL_second_national_catastrophe_02 }
					remove_ideas = BUL_second_national_catastrophe_02
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "Graveyard of Empires"
					original_tag = PER
					has_cosmetic_tag = PER_loyalist_iran
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}

	#used when puppeting in a peace conference
	#ROOT = nation being puppeted, FROM = overlord

	on_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = DDR
						original_tag = WGR
						original_tag = GER
					}
					has_government = communism
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = { name = "Wilhelm Pieck" }
						has_country_leader = { character = GER_wilhelm_pieck }
					}
					FROM = {
						original_tag = SOV
						has_government = communism
						has_country_leader = { character = SOV_iosif_stalin } # Would look silly if Trotsky released Stalin's Puppet
					}
				}
				add_country_leader_trait = stalins_puppet
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_elections = yes }
					has_government = democratic
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = democratic
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#used when puppeting through the occupied territories menu during peace time (or when releasing from non-core but owned territory, f.e. Britain releasing Egypt)
	#ROOT = nation being released, FROM = overlord

	on_release_as_puppet = {
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = DDR
						original_tag = WGR
						original_tag = GER
					}
					has_government = communism
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = { name = "Wilhelm Pieck" }
						has_country_leader = { character = GER_wilhelm_pieck }
					}					FROM = {
						original_tag = SOV
						has_government = communism
						has_country_leader = { character = SOV_iosif_stalin } # Would look silly if Trotsky released Stalin's Puppet
					}
				}
				add_country_leader_trait = stalins_puppet
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_elections = yes }
					has_government = democratic
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = democratic
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#ROOT is winner #FROM gets annexed - For civil wars on_civil_war_end is also fired
	on_annex = {
		effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = RAJ
						original_tag = CAN
						original_tag = MAL
						original_tag = INS
					}
					is_puppet = no
				}
				abandon_colony_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}

	#Not run on a specific country.
	on_startup = {

		effect = {  

			GER = { #Axis and Poland just didn't get along
				add_ai_strategy = {
				   type = alliance
				   id = POL
				   value = -2000
				}
			}
			POL = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
				   type = alliance
				   id = GER
				   value = -2000
				}
			}
			GER = { 
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = MINORS_ONLY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = MINORS_FACTIONS
							}
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = GER_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GER_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					GER = {
						set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = TRUE_RANDOM
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = GER_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GER_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_BERLIN_MOSCOW } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_BLITZKRIEG } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_EXP } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_FRIENDLY } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_WW } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER } }
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER_ALT } 
						}
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER_EXP } 
						}
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER_DIPLO } 
						}
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER_BLITZKRIEG } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER_CHINA_ALLY } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_KAISER_ENG_ALLY } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_DIPLO } }
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_COLONIAL } 
						}
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_EXP } 
						}
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALINIST } 
						}
						1 = { 
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
							}
							GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALINIST_EXP } 
						}

									NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
								}
							}
							GER = {
								set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_EXP
								set_add_democratic_game_weight_large = yes
								set_global_flag = NHMMAP_has_euro_democratic_leader
							}
						}
						4 = {
							modifier = {
								factor = 0.40
								game_weight_can_add_communist = no
								NOT = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}
							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								OR = {
									NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = FASCIST_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = AUTHORITARIAN_ONLY
									}
								}
							}
							GER = {
								set_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALINIST
								set_add_communist_weight_large = yes
							}
						}
						2 = {
							modifier = {
								factor = 0.40
								game_weight_can_add_communist = no
								NOT = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}

							modifier = {
								factor = 0
								OR = {
									NOT = { has_dlc = "Gotterdammerung" }

					}

			}
			GER = { 
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = COMMUNIST_ONLY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = AUTHORITARIAN_ONLY
							}
						}
					}
					#DO nothing
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = MINORS_ONLY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = MINORS_FACTIONS
							}
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = GER_ai_fuhrer
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GER_ai_fuhrer
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					GER = {
						set_country_flag = GER_AI_FUHRER_RANDOM_HITLER
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = TRUE_RANDOM

								is_historical_focus_on = no

								option = RANDOM

						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_FUHRER_RANDOM_BORMANN } }
						1 = { GER = { set_country_flag = GER_AI_FUHRER_RANDOM_GOEBBELS } }

				if = {
					limit = {

									option = DEFAULT

							modifier = {

								game_weight_can_add_communist = no

										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}

									OR = { # make stalin more likely if germany is on historical AI for balance reasons

										}
									}

										option = FASCIST_ONLY

									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
									}
								}
							}
							modifier = { # DONT DO IF GERMANY WILL DO BERLIN MOSCOW
								factor = 0.01
								GER = { 
									OR = {
										has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_BERLIN_MOSCOW
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = GER_ai_behavior
											option = FASCIST_BERLIN_MOSCOW
										}
									}
								}
							}
							modifier = {
								factor = 0.40
								game_weight_can_add_fascist = no
								NOT = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}
							
						}	
					}
			
				}

			CHI = { #No game weighting here 
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_dlc = "No Compromise, No Surrender" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger"
							OR = {
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
									option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
									option = MINORS_ONLY
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
									option = MINORS_FACTIONS
								}
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = CHI_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = CHI_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL
						set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_UNITED_FRONT
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger"
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = TRUE_RANDOM
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = CHI_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = CHI_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}
						}
						random_list = {
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL } }
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC } }
						}
						random_list = {
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_FOCUS_HISTORICAL } }
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_UNITED_FRONT } }
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_INTERIOR } }
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger"
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									AND = {
										is_historical_focus_on = no
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = CHI_ai_behavior
											option = DEFAULT
										}
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = CHI_ai_behavior
										option = RANDOM
									}
								}
							}
							random_list = {
								80 = { 
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										OR = {
											has_game_rule = {
												rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
												option = ANTI_HISTORICAL
											}
											has_game_rule = {
												rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
												option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
											}
										}
									}
									CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL } 
								}
								20 = { 
									modifier = {
										factor = 0.1
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = REALISTIC
										}
									}
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = AUTHORITARIAN_ONLY
										}
									}
									CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC } 
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									AND = {
										is_historical_focus_on = no
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = CHI_ai_behavior_focus
											option = DEFAULT
										}
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = CHI_ai_behavior_focus
										option = RANDOM
									}
								}
							}
							random_list = {
								50 = { 
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = ANTI_HISTORICAL

								}
								25 = { 
									CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_UNITED_FRONT } 
								}
								25 = { 
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = REALISTIC
										}
									}
									CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_INTERIOR } 
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Compromise, No Surrender" 
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
							}

									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

									option = RANDOM
								}

					}

								}

									rule = CHI_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}

							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_WANG_JINGWEI } }
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST } }
							1 = { CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_SEA } }
						}
					}
					else = {
						random_list = {
							40 = { 
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = FASCIST_ONLY

										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = ANTI_HISTORICAL
										}
									}
								}
								CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL_SEA } 
							}
							20 = { 
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = FASCIST_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
										}
									}
								}
								CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_WANG_JINGWEI } 
							}
							20 = { 
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = AUTHORITARIAN_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
										}
									}
								}
								modifier = {
									factor = 0.2
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC
									}
								}
								CHI = { set_country_flag = CHI_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST } 
							}
							20 = { 
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = REALISTIC

										}

											option = FASCIST_ONLY

				if = {
					limit = {

							modifier = {
								factor = 0.40
								game_weight_can_add_democratic = no
								NOT = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}

								factor = 0

									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = COMMUNIST_ONLY

								factor = 2
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = NHMMAP_has_euro_democratic_leader

										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

			}
			JAP = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger"
							has_dlc = "No Compromise, No Surrender"
						}
						
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
									option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
									option = MINORS_ONLY
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
									option = MINORS_FACTIONS
								}
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = JAP_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = JAP_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}
						}
						set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Compromise, No Surrender"
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = TRUE_RANDOM
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = JAP_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = JAP_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}
						}
						random_list = {
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_2 }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_NEUTRALITY_SHOWA }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC }
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = JAP_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = JAP_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}

							40 = {
								modifier = {

									game_weight_can_add_fascist = no
									NOT = {

				}

				else_if = {
					limit = { 
						has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger" 
						NOT = { has_dlc = "No Compromise, No Surrender" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = TRUE_RANDOM
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = JAP_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = JAP_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}
						}
						random_list = {
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_ASIAN_SOLIDARITY }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_NEUTRALITY_SHOWA }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_NEUTRALITY_SHOGUN }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC }
							1 = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_PACIFIC_TREATY }
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = JAP_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = JAP_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}

							40 = {

									factor = 0.40
									game_weight_can_add_fascist = no
									NOT = {

											option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
										}
									}
								}
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = ANTI_HISTORICAL
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = COMMUNIST_ONLY
										}
									}
								}
								JAP = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST }
								set_add_fascist_game_weight_large = yes

									factor = 0.40
									game_weight_can_add_fascist = no
									NOT = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
										}
									}
								}

									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC

											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = FASCIST_ONLY

											option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY

											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

								set_add_fascist_game_weight_large = yes
							}
							15 = {
								modifier = {
									factor = 0.40
									game_weight_can_add_fascist = no
									NOT = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
										}
									}
								}
								modifier = {
									factor = 0.6
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC
									}
								}
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = FASCIST_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = COMMUNIST_ONLY
										}
									}
								}
								JAP = { set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_NEUTRALITY_SHOGUN }
								set_add_fascist_game_weight_large = yes
							}
							10 = {
								modifier = {
									factor = 0.40
									game_weight_can_add_democratic = no
									NOT = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
										}
									}
								}

									factor = 0
									OR = {
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
											option = REALISTIC
										}
										has_game_rule = {

											option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
										}

									}

					}


				}
				else = { #If you don't have WTT or NCNS then there is only 1 path (for now, until I do NCNS japan paths)
					set_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
				}
			}
			ROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Death or Dishonor"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Death or Dishonor"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = ROM_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = ROM_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = ROM_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_HISTORICAL
				}

					limit = {

								rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
								option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = HUN_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = HUN_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}

						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_SPLIT_U_ALLIANCE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_SPLIT_U_AXIS }
						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_SPLIT_U_AXIS_EXPANSION }
						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST }
						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_SLAVIC }
						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_BALKAN }
						1 = { set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_NEUTRAL }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Death or Dishonor"
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = YUG_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}

								game_weight_can_add_communist = no

									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}
							modifier = { 
								factor = 0
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = AUTHORITARIAN_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = FASCIST_ONLY
									}
								}
							}
							set_country_flag = YUG_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST

								OR = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

									has_game_rule = {

										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

									}
									has_game_rule = {

			AST = {
				if = {

							has_game_rule = {
								rule = AST_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM

											is_historical_focus_on = no
											has_game_rule = {
												rule = GER_ai_behavior
												option = DEFAULT
											}
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = GER_ai_behavior
											option = RANDOM
										}
									}
									OR = {
										AND = { #if GER is democratic
											NOT = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_REPUBLIC
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_REPUBLIC_LEFT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_REPUBLIC_RIGHT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_LEFT_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_RIGHT_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SOCIAL_CATHOLICISM
												}
											}
											NOT = {
												GER = {
													OR = {
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_COLONIAL
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_DIPLO
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_EXP
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = { #if GER is trotskyite
											NOT = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_CARDENISMO
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_TROTSKY
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_INSTITUTIONAL_COMMUNISM
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_INSTITUTIONAL_COMMUNISM_LEFT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_LEFT_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_MODERATES
												}
											}
											NOT = {
												GER = {
													OR = {
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_SPARTACUS
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_SPARTACUS_NEU
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = { #if GER is stalinist
											NOT = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SOVIET_REPUBLIC
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_INSTITUTIONAL_COMMUNISM_RIGHT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_RIGHT_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_MODERATES
												}
											}
											NOT = {
												GER = {
													OR = {
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_BERLIN_MOSCOW
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALINIST
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALINIST_EXP
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALINIST_SPHERES
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = { #if GER is fascist
											NOT = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_CEDILLO_REBELS
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_FALANGIST
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_FASCIST_DICTATORSHIP
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_FASCIST_JUNTA
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_THEOCRATIC_ORDER
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_RIGHT_MODERATES
												}
											}
											NOT = {
												GER = {
													OR = {
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_BERLIN_MOSCOW
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_BLITZKRIEG
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_EXP
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_FRIENDLY
														has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_WW
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_country_flag = MEX_AI_FP_GER 
							}
							12 = { 
								modifier = {
									factor = 0
									OR = { #ideology is not already chosen
										AND = { 
											is_historical_focus_on = no
											has_game_rule = {
												rule = MEX_ai_behavior
												option = DEFAULT
											}
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = MEX_ai_behavior
											option = RANDOM
										}
									}
									OR = { #ideology is not already chosen
										AND = { 
											is_historical_focus_on = no
											has_game_rule = {
												rule = SOV_ai_behavior
												option = DEFAULT
											}
										}
										has_game_rule = {
											rule = SOV_ai_behavior
											option = RANDOM
										}
									}
									OR = {
										SOV = { #if sov is exiles just forget it
											OR = {
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_FASCIST_AXIS
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_FASCIST_AXIS_AMERICAS
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_FASCIST_JAPAN_PUPPET
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_FASCIST_JAPAN_PUPPET_REBEL
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_TSARIST_PROTECTOR
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_TSARIST_ROME
												has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_EXILES_TSARIST_SLAVIC
											}
										}
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_CEDILLO_REBELS
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_FALANGIST
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_FASCIST_DICTATORSHIP
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_FASCIST_JUNTA
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_THEOCRATIC_ORDER
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_RIGHT_MODERATES
										has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_REPUBLIC_RIGHT
										AND = { #if SOV is stalin
											NOT = {
												OR = {
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_INSTITUTIONAL_COMMUNISM
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_INSTITUTIONAL_COMMUNISM_LEFT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SOVIET_REPUBLIC
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_INSTITUTIONAL_COMMUNISM_RIGHT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_REPUBLIC
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_REPUBLIC_LEFT
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_SECULAR_MODERATES
													has_country_flag = MEX_AI_LEFT_MODERATES
												}
											}
											NOT = {
												SOV = {
													OR = {
														has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_HISTORICAL
														has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALIN_AGGRESSIVE
														has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_STALIN_ALTERNATE
													}
												}
											}
										}
										AND = { #if SOV is opposition
											NOT = {
												OR = {

														has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_LEFT_SMIRNOV
														has_country_flag = SOV_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_LEFT_TROTSKY

							}

					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_historical_focus_on = no
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = MEX_exp_ai_behavior
										option = DEFAULT
									}
								}
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = MEX_exp_ai_behavior
									option = RANDOM
								}
							}
						}
						random_list = {
							30 = { set_country_flag = MEX_AI_EXPANSION }
							70 = { set_country_flag = MEX_AI_NO_EXPANSION }		
						}
					}
				}
			}
			SPR = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "La Resistance"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "La Resistance"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

								}

								option = RANDOM

						1 = { set_country_flag = SPR_AI_RANDOM_NATIONALIST_HISTORICAL }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SPR_AI_RANDOM_SECOND_REPUBLIC }

				else_if = {

							}

					SPA = { set_country_flag = SPA_AI_RANDOM_NATIONALIST_HISTORICAL }

					limit = {
						has_dlc = "La Resistance"

						}

									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = SPA_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						1 = { 
							set_country_flag = SPA_AI_RANDOM_NATIONALIST_ALLIES

								factor = 0

				if = {

								is_historical_focus_on = no

			GRE = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Battle for the Bosporus"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Battle for the Bosporus"

							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

						}

							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = GRE_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GRE_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = GRE_AI_RANDOM_NEUTRALITY_HISTORICAL

									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = LIT_ai_behavior

							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_OCCUPATION }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_BALTIC }

						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_ALLIES }

						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_BALTIC_UNION }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_FALANGIST }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_FALANGIST_LIVONIA }

						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_LTS_BALTIC_ENTENTE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_LTS_BALTIC_UNION }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHY }
						1 = { set_country_flag = LIT_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHY_AGGRESSIVE }
					}

			LAT = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = LIT_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = LIT_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = LAT_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL

					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"

			}
			EST = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = EST_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = EST_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "No Step Back"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = TRUE_RANDOM
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = EST_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = EST_ai_behavior

							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_BALTIC }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_BALTIC_SSR }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_BELARUS }

						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_SSR }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_ALLIES }				
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_BALTIC_ENTENTE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_BALTIC_UNION }

						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_UGRA }
						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_OCCUPATION }

						1 = { set_country_flag = EST_AI_RANDOM_PL_BALTIC_ENTENTE }

										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior

								}

			RAJ = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_dlc = "Together for Victory" 
						NOT = { has_dlc = "Graveyard of Empires" }
					}
					
					
					set_variable = { RAJ_agrarian_society_value = -0.70 }
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RAJ_agrarian_society_dynamic }
					remove_ideas = RAJ_agrarian_society #For startup screen
				}
			}
			SWE = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = NO_AI_STRATEGY
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = NO_AI_STRATEGY_RULE
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = SWE_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = SWE_ai_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = TRUE_RANDOM
						}

							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no

									rule = SWE_ai_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {

								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}

						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_HISTORICAL }

						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_NORDIC_DEFENCE_FACTION }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_DEMOCRATIC_NORDIC_DEFENCE_FACTION_EXP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_FLYG }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_FLYG_AXIS }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_FLYG_AXIS_AGGR }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_FLYG_NORDIC }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_FLYG_NORDIC_AGGR }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_KILBOM }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_KILBOM_ALLIES }

						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_LINDEROT_COMINTERN_AGGR }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_LINDEROT_NORDIC }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_COMMUNIST_LINDEROT_NORDIC_AGGR }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_INDEPENDENT }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_NEU_ASSERTIVE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_NEU_EXP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_NEU_ANTI_SOV }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_ALLIES }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_ALLIES_ASSERTIVE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_ALLIES_EXP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_ALLIES_ANTI_SOV }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_FIN }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_FIN_ASSERTIVE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_FIN_ANTI_SOV }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_PUPPET }	
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST_PUPPET_NORDLAND }	
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_PUPPET_BACKSTABBER }	
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_UNALIGNED }	
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_NEU_ASSERTIVE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_NEU_EXP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_NEU_ANTI_SOV }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_ALLIES }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_ALLIES_ASSERTIVE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_ALLIES_EXP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_ALLIES_ANTI_SOV }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_FIN }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_FIN_ASSERTIVE }
						1 = { set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_MONARCHIST_FIN_ANTI_SOV }
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = SWE_AI_BEHAVIOR
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = SWE_AI_BEHAVIOR
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						19 = { #Go fascist
							modifier = {
								factor = 0.40
								game_weight_can_add_fascist = no
								NOT = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}
							modifier = { 
								factor = 0
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = COMMUNIST_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = MONARCHIST_ONLY
									}
								}
							}
							set_add_fascist_weight_small = yes
							random_list = { #Which type of fascist
								13 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										GER = {
											NOT = {
												OR = { #Dont go fascist puppet unless Germany is going fascist 
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = FASCIST
													}
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = GER_ALT_FASCIST
													}
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_BLITZKRIEG
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = GER_ALT_FASCIST_BLITZKRIEG
													}
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_EXP
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = GER_ALT_FASCIST_EXP
													}
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_FRIENDLY
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = GER_ALT_FASCIST_FRIENDLY
													}
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST_WW
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = GER_ALT_FASCIST_WW
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}

									modifier = {
										factor = 0.5 #unlikely to become backstabber if GER is Player
										GER = { is_ai = no }
									}
									set_country_flag = SWE_AI_RANDOM_PUPPET_BACKSTABBER
								}

								20 = {
									modifier = { #Dont go fascist puppet unless Germany is going fascist 
										factor = 0
										GER = {
											NOT = {
												OR = { #Dont go fascist puppet unless Germany is going fascist 
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = FASCIST
													}
													has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_ALT_FASCIST
													has_game_rule = {
														rule = GER_ai_behavior
														option = GER_ALT_FASCIST
													}

									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}
							modifier = { 
								factor = 0
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = REALISTIC
									}
									has_game_rule = {

									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = DEMOCRATIC_ONLY
									}
								}
							}

								factor = 2
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = NHMMAP_has_euro_communist_leader
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = NO_GAME_BALANCE
									}
								}
							}
							set_global_flag = NHMMAP_has_euro_communist_leader
							set_add_communist_weight_small = yes
							NOR = {

			DEN = {
				if = { #setting game rule for occupation ideology
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = HISTORICAL_PATHS
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = DEN_ai_overlord_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = DEN_ai_overlord_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_RESIST #historical
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_dlc = "Arms Against Tyranny"
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
							option = TRUE_RANDOM
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_historical_focus_on = no
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = DEN_ai_overlord_behavior
									option = DEFAULT
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = DEN_ai_overlord_behavior
								option = RANDOM
							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						1 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_RESIST }
						1 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_RESIST_INDP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_COMPLY }
						1 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_COMPLY_EXP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_COMPLY_INDP }
						1 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_COMPLY_SABOTAGE }
					}
				}

						20 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_RESIST_INDP }
						20 = { set_country_flag = DEN_AI_RANDOM_OVERLORD_COMPLY }

										rule = NONHIST_ai_behavior
										option = FASCIST_ONLY
									}
